name: Power Quest (itch)
description:
The game is meant to be a short RPG-based explore and combat boss action retro game.

The narrative of the game is to explore a world where there is are a number of bosses to defeat along the way, ultimately to save the world. The user will have to choose which path to take and the order in which they will combat the bosses. It is important to choose wisely as there will be power-ups and items/objects (weapons, for example) along the way to collect and use in the combats. The objective of the game is to complete the world and defeat all bosses.

- Daniel Santos (2222144)
